scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains two tickets to a 1922 reading by Lindsay, an invitation to a 1924 reception for Lindsay given by Miss Albertine D. Filiatrault at The Book Shop and a notecard with a wood-carved print of Lindsay's home in Springfield, Illinois.
Also included is a manuscript of an untitled poem by Lindsay beginning, "You Will Be What You Will To Be..."
